name: AGameAWeek Gold - 10 Years
description:
Welcome to the wonderful world of AGameAWeek.

Over the past decade I've written hundreds of fun and playable games, and they're all available at AGameAWeek.com

To celebrate a decade of doing this insane task, I've plucked out some of my favourites and made this little bundle.  If you like what you see, be sure to follow me here on itch.io, and then head on over to AGameAWeek to see what other goodies you can find.

And before anyone asks why ALL the games aren't available on itch.io...  would YOU like to sit and upload hundreds of games, screenshots and descriptions to itch.io?!  Nah, me neither!!
